page.title: 06TRANSPORT GOLDSBOROUGH
page.content: Buses which come through{Goldsborough are on the{York}to{Knaresborough}route There are two buses early in the morning and two in the afternoon and one late in the evening.On market day there is an extra bus but fewer buses run on{Sundays.}From {Coneythorpe}two} buses run to{Knaresborough}all the week days.On{market day}four buses run but none on Sundays.There is one bus through{Wetherby}to{Leeds}each hour which goes down{Wetherby Road.} The{railway line}from{Knaresborough to{York}runs through {Flaxby.}The {Station house}was built in 1387.The station opened in 1845. The last station {Master}moved out in 1970 when the station closed down.One of the 2 lines was removed.Trains still run on the 1 remaining line-2 goods trains a day carry steel to Harrogate and 1 passenger train each hour.
